page.title: 17BRAZIER DAIRIES
page.content: Brazier Dairies on Oxhey Lane is the distribution depot for 47 milk floats and 5 vans.45 of these vehicles go out everyday to Northwood,Croxley Green, St.Albans,South Oxhey,Carpenders Park,Eastcote and Watford.As well as milk,the roundsmen sell fruit juice, fizzy drinks ,bread,potatoes,butter and even pet food,biscuits and tea bags.Skimmed milk has become popular, especially in the summer.The milk floats are cream and green coloured and can hold up to 1200 pints.The batteries of the electrically operated floats have to be charged up daily for 12 hours.The cows in the surrounding fields are beef cattle and are not used for milk. The present price for Jersey full cream milk is 25p per pint.{
